items.title: PlayStation is making an MLB The Show mobile game
items.summary: This is a screenshot from the PS5 version of MLB The Show 25. MLB The Show is coming to iOS and Android. Sony has revealed MLB The Show Mobile, which it says is â€œa new standalone experience built from the ground up to deliver realistic baseball gameplay on mobile devices.â€ The game is live now onlyâ€¦

items.title: This haptic mattress topper lets you feel a movie while you fall asleep during it
items.summary: Woojer is best known for its vibrating vests and belt straps that let you feel the sounds from games, movies, and music. Now the company has taken that same haptic technology and incorporated it into a new mattress topper called the Woojer Mat that will let you feel those same vibrations across youâ€¦

items.title: CR: Samsung breaks record for most foldable smartphone shipments in Q3
items.summary: Global shipments for foldable smartphones were up 14% in Q3 2025, reaching record quarterly levels, and Samsung was the undisputed leader with an estimated 64% share of all shipments for the quarter. The latest report from Counterpoint Research estimates that Samsungâ€™s Galaxy Z Fold7 and Z Flip7 weâ€¦

items.title: Will a Salford phoenix club be able to contest 2026 season?

items.summary: Fitness trackers have come a long way from the simple bands that tracked steps and little else. Modern trackers can monitor everything from your heart health to how well youâ€™ve recovered from a hard bout of training. Even flagship smartwatches, which used to be lackluster trackers, have become pretâ€¦

items.title: South Africa chase record 359 to beat India
items.summary: South Africa complete the joint highest chase in the history of one-day internationals in India as they passed a target of 359 to win by four wickets in Naya Raipur.

items.title: Barcelona come from behind to beat Atletico Madrid
items.summary: Barcelona come from behind to beat Atletico Madrid and go four points clear at the top of La Liga.

items.title: Howe laments 'painful' end to game
items.summary: Eddie Howe says Tottenham's late equaliser was a "painful" end to a game in which Newcastle had twice taken the lead.

items.title: 'As if she won Champions League' - Kendall's special night for England
items.summary: Lucia Kendall's night could not have felt more special and England boss Sarina Wiegman said her goal celebration was "like winning the Champions League".

items.title: Injury-time Romero overhead kick rescues point for Spurs
items.summary: Cristian Romero's superb 95th-minute overhead kick secures a dramatic point for Tottenham Hotspur against Newcastle United to ease the pressure on manager Thomas Frank.

items.title: 'I'm so old the players don't respect me!' Guardiola reacts to nine-goal epic
items.summary: Pep Guardiola jokes that he is "so old my players don't respect me" after Manchester City almost surrendered a four-goal lead against Fulham.

items.title: Man City hold off incredible Fulham fightback as Haaland passes milestone
items.summary: Erling Haaland becomes the quickest player to reach 100 goals in Premier League history as Manchester City ramp up pressure on leaders Arsenal by fending off Fulham's impressive fightback in a nine-goal thriller.

items.title: Late Grealish goal gives Everton victory at Bournemouth
